name: cupcake maker salon - free game
description:
Make some YUMMY Cupcakes! Enjoy all the fun and excitement that goes into making cupcakes! Experience everything from the baking to the decorating! Remember to share your tasty creations with your friends!
Features:
 - Flavors, Flavors, and more Flavors!  
- Decorate with frosting, candy, cute little icing designs and much much more! 
- Includes sound clips that makes you feel like you’re actually in the Kitchen! 
- Real photos with high definition quality!

Do you love to make cupcakes? Hate to clean up the mess afterward? Download Cupcake Maker and satisfy the urge you have to bake cupcakes without cleaning up afterward! This app is great for kids of all ages!
